text: [Music]
the tools we use to get things done are
generating more data than ever but this
data is often noisy inconsistent and
highly variable this makes it hard or
even impossible for businesses to gain
value from it this is where IOT
analytics comes in a product of Amazon
Web Services IOT analytics helps collect
clean and analyze IOT data this empowers
enterprises and device manufacturers to
quickly and easily gain operational
insights to better understand how i OT
analytics helps it's good to understand
who it helps meet the data engineer and
the data analysts they are the core
users IOT analytics empowers the data
engineer collects the data from devices
making sure it's properly prepared and
stored for analysis the data analyst
produces and communicates insights by
exploring and visualizing data with
these two users in mind
IOT analytics has been designed with
three basic areas collect process and
analyze let's talk about collect first
this area is all about preparing data
for analysis channels are how IOT
analytics listens to devices using
protocols such as MQTT topic filters
channels pull messages into IOT
analytics from all manner of devices
next process once messages are flowing
pipelines are used to process messages
turning them into useful data pipelines
use handy activities like transforms
filters and even enrichment from other
AWS services and beyond when the
pipeline has done its work data stores
provide a resting place for the prepared
data where it is now ready for analysis
which is a perfect segue to the third
area of IOT analytics analyze this is
where IOT analytics helps users slice
into their data to quickly gain insight
to explore and refine data sets can be
created simply by querying data stores
datasets can be created once or
refreshed automatically to provide
regular up-to-date insights
to gain even deeper insights Jupiter
notebooks empower people to get creative
with their data and easy to use notebook
templates make it fast to use machine
learning models and other common IOT
analytical functions IOT analytics also
ties in nicely with AWS quick site to
visualize data so sharing insights is a
piece of cake from start to finish
IOT analytics makes it faster and easier
to collect and analyze even the most
complex IOT data IOT analytics interface
is a user-friendly console designed and
optimized with both data engineers and
data analysts in mind this means IOT
analytics can accommodate different
skill sets and objectives but also
afford stronger collaboration and
communication between roles IOT
analytics by Amazon Web Services
delivering custom IOT analytics at scale
and faster than ever before
[Music]
